thread.title: I’m not leading the Democrats too far to the left
thread.title_full: I’m not leading the Democrats too far to the left - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: I’m not leading the Democrats too far to the left
text: Bernie Sanders may be the most progressive candidate running for president, but he doesn’t see any risk that he is pulling the Democratic party too far to the left. The senator from Vermont pushed back against that notion in an interview with talk show host Tavis Smiley that starting airing overnight Monday on PBS stations. […] ...
